title: Simulation-Based Social Learning Program for Concept Acquisition

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social concepts comprehension and digital device usage experience
context.additional_context: VR content-centered education using smartphones, applying task-based learning to strengthen conceptual analysis and cognitive processes.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze structural characteristics of social concepts with 85% accuracy within one week.
Learners can explain causal relationships of social phenomena in three or more stages within simulation environments.
Learners can complete portfolios applying acquired concepts to real-world case studies through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
